summary: The SPRINT_PLANNING_ARCHITECT explained a failed attempt to automate adding a new user story (US-016) to the backlog via an HTTP POST to a local API endpoint, which returned a 404 error due to the server not running or the endpoint missing. They suggested manual addition or proceeding with sprint approval while addressing the API issue.

actions.task: Add US-016 manually via UI or DB if API fix is delayed
Restart local server or implement /add-story endpoint to resolve 404 error

risks.risk: Local API server not running or endpoint /add-story not implemented, causing automation failures
risks.mitigation: Restart server, verify routes, or fall back to manual backlog updates
